description:
Waterproof winter boots that offer considerable warmth. The winter-worthy sole provides grip on icy surfaces. Great for exploring or just getting around easily.

  • Waterproof full-grain leather upper is durable and abrasion-resistant
  • Waterproof-breathable membrane seals out water and lets sweat escape
  • Moulded nylon arch shank adds support
  • Bellows tongue keeps debris out
  • Metal hooks for secure lacing
  • 200 grams of Primaloft® Gold Eco Series synthetic insulation keeps feet toasty
  • Cleansport NXT™ natural odour control keeps your feet smelling fresh
  • 100% recycled laces, webbing, footbed cover, and lining
  • Compression-moulded EVA midsole stabilizes and cushions feet
  • Sticky rubber outsole provides traction on both wet and dry surfaces
name: Merrell Thermo Kiruna 2 Mid Shell Waterproof Winter Boots - Women's
